attributes.action: A new Good friday to get the Northern Ireland executive back and running again
attributes.additional_details: The Amendment is for the purpose of allowing the goverment of Northern Ireland to get back to work. The amendment should be put to the people of Northern Ireland via referendum. The people of Northen Ireland Need the executive back up and running we are in the worst cost of living crisis seen since the end of WWII. Until the power to collapse the goverment is taken away from one singular Party the peace process is in jepordy and so are the lives of all citizens of Northern Ireland.
attributes.background: Make an amendments to the Good friday agreement to allow powersharing to be opened up to allow an Excecutive to be formed by parties who are willing to uphold the excecutive and allow the democrated process to return to Northern Ireland to avoid one party holding the institutions to ransom.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616176
